韸字的基本解释

韸
péng
鼓声和谐：“时听戍鼓韸韸。”
姓。

韸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄紅切，平東，並。］
亦作“韼1”。
(1)鼓名。参见“韸子”。
(2)见“韸韸”。

韸字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【音字部】　韸； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1397第18
【廣韻】薄紅切【集韻】薄蒙切【正韻】薄紅切，?音蓬。【玉篇】和也，鼓聲也。【集韻】本作逢。或作韼、?。　又【集韻】敷逢切，音豐。義同。

韸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
韸字的起名意思

鼓名。

韸
Basic explanation of words
韸
péng
Harmony of drum sounds: "When I listen to the drum 韸韸."
name.
韸
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Guangyun" thin red cut, Pingdong, and. ]
Also known as "韼1".
(1) The name of the drum. See "韸子".
(2) See "韸韸".
韸
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[戌集] [Phonetic Word Department] 　韸; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1397 Page 18
[Guang Yun] thin red cut [Ji Yun] thin Meng cut [Zheng Yun] thin red cut,? Yin Peng. [Jade articles] Harmony, and the sound of drums. [Ji Yun] This is a meeting. Or as Yun, ?.　 [Ji Yun] Fu Fengqie, sound abundant. The same meaning.
